About Us

local.mobi is proud and passionate about mobile websites. We have 30+ years of combined experience in the mobile world and have seen and been activity involved in the many developments of mobile technology and marketing. local.mobi gives you and your customers 24/7 anywhere access to businesses with a simple, easy-to-use mobile website that puts the information at your customers fingertips.
